## ExtrusionFeatureParameters interface

Parameters used when constructing a new implementor of \[\[ExtrusionFeature\]\].

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface ExtrusionFeatureParameters 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [extrusionRatio](./harp-materials.extrusionfeatureparameters.extrusionratio.md) | number | Ratio of the extruded objects, where <code>1.0</code> is the default value |
|  [zFightingWorkaround](./harp-materials.extrusionfeatureparameters.zfightingworkaround.md) | boolean | Enable z-fighting workaround that doesn't animate buildings with <code>height &lt; [[ExtrusionFeatureDefs.MIN_BUILDING_HEIGHT]]</code>.<!-- -->Should be applied to <code>polygon</code> materials using this feature. |
